explanation: Funds are required for efforts by the United States Africa Command (USAFRICOM) ($34.7 million) and United States Southem Command (USSOUTHCOM) ($15.1 million) to expand cooperation or improve the capabilities of our allies and partners in their areas of operation pursuant to section 8068 of division C of Public Law 117-328, the Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2023. This is a congressional special interest item.
